LightningComponentBundle.description: A simple GDS footer that can be used at the bottom of a community page.

property.name: secondaryNavigationRequired
property.label: Enable Footer with Secondary Navigation
property.description: Check the checkbox if you want to use footer with secondary navigation and fill below 4 fields.

property.name: sectionNames
property.label: Section Names
property.description: Please provide semicolon separated Section Names

property.name: navigationNames
property.label: Navigation Items
property.description: Please provide Pipe symbol '|' separated navigation items for each section and semicolon should be used to differentiate between each sections

property.name: navigationLinks
property.label: Navigation URL's
property.description: Please provide Pipe symbol '|' separated navigation URLs in th same order correposding to the navigation item names for each section and semicolon should be used to differentiate between each sections

property.name: columnTypes
property.label: Column Type
property.description: Please provide valueas either 1 or 2 corresponding to 1 column and 2 column format

property.name: metalinksRequired
property.label: Enable Footer with links to Meta information
property.description: Check the checkbox if you want footer with links as meta information and fill below 2 fields.

property.name: crownLogoRequired
property.label: Enable Footer with Crown Logo
property.description: Check the checkbox if you want footer with Crown Logo

property.name: metalinkNames
property.label: Meta Information Link Names
property.description: Please provide semicolon list of the display names to the links

property.name: metalinkURL
property.label: Meta Information Link URL's
property.description: Please provide semicolon list of the links in same order corresponding to the above mentioned names
